title: Ethical Design in the Age of Algorithms
author: Maria Oto
summary: Building products that respect user privacy, autonomy, and well-being.
content:
Design is a powerful tool. In 2026, we must use it responsibly. Dark patterns are out; ethical transparency is in.

## Designing for Privacy
Privacy should be the default, not an option. We build systems that only collect what is strictly necessary.

## Algorithmic Transparency
Users deserve to know why a certain piece of content is being shown to them. Open design helps build long-term trust.
